boardgame.name: Castle Panic
War Thunder: Осада
boardgame.description: The forest is filled with all sorts of monsters. They watched and waited as you built your castle and trained your soldiers, but now they've gathered their army and are marching out of the woods. Can you work with your friends to defend your castle against the horde, or will the monsters tear down your walls and destroy the precious castle towers? You will all win or lose together, but in the end only one player will be declared the Master Slayer!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Castle Panic is a cooperative, light strategy game for 1 to 6 players ages 10 and up. Players must work together to defend their castle, in the center of the board, from monsters that attack out of the forest at the edges of the board. Players trade cards, hit and slay monsters, and plan strategies together to keep their castle towers intact. The players either win or lose together, but only the player with the most victory points is declared the Master Slayer. Players must balance the survival of the group with their own desire to win._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: The forest is filled with all sorts of Monsters. They watched and waited as you built your Castle and trained your soldiers - but now they’ve gathered their army and are marching out of the woods! Can you work with your friends to defend your Castle against the horde, or will the Monsters tear down your walls and destroy the precious Castle Towers? You will all win or lose together, but in the end only one player will be declared the Master Slayer! Scheduled to ship in September 2009. PSI FSD1001............................$35.00 PREORDER NOW! Shipping of just $9.95 nationwide. Combined shipping is easy and encouraged! Just checkout and we will confirm it with combined shipping as noted in our rules below. Basically 100% shipping on the first game and 50% shipping on the rest, or better.

Can you work with your friends to defend your Castle against the horde, or will the Monsters tear down your walls and destroy the precious Castle Towers? You will all win or lose together, but in the end only one player will be declared the Master Slayer! Scheduled to ship in September 2009. PSI FSD1001............................$35.00 IN STOCK! Fireside Games (FSD 1001) Designed By: Justin De Witt The forest is filled with all sorts of Monsters. They watched and waited as you built your Castle and trained your soldiers, but now they’ve gathered their army and are marching out of the woods. Can you work with your friends to defend your Castle against the horde, or will the Monsters tear down your Walls and destroy the precious Castle Towers? You will all win or lose together, but in the end only one player will be declared the Master Slayer! Castle Panic is a unique, cooperative strategy game for 1 to 6 players ages 10 and up. Players must work together to defend their castle, in the center of the board, from monsters that attack out of the forest, at the edges of the board. Players trade cards, hit and slay monsters, and plan strategies together to keep their castle towers intact. The players either win or lose together, but only the player with the most victory points is declared the Master Slayer. Players must balance the survival of the group with their own desire to win.

New in Shrink. £4.40 postage to UK. I will ship worldwide (please ask, if outside the UK, for a shipping quote before ordering), combine orders for cheaper postage and will give a 2.5% discount for purchases over £50 and 5% for purchases over £100. All items (600 unique games) I list are in stock and will be posted within 24 working hours of payment being received.

Players must work together to defend their castle, in the center of the board, from monsters that attack out of the forest, at the edges of the board. Players trade cards, hit and slay monsters, and plan strategies together to keep their castle towers intact. The players either win or lose together, but only the player with the most victory points is declared the Master Slayer. Players must balance the survival of the group with their own desire to win.

The forest is filled with all sorts of Monsters. They watched and waited as you built your Castle and trained your soldiers - but now they’ve gathered their army and are marching out of the woods! Can you work with your friends to defend your Castle against the horde, or will the Monsters tear down your walls and destroy the precious Castle Towers? You will all win or lose together, but in the end only one player will be declared the Master Slayer! Scheduled to ship in September 2009. PSI FSD1001............................$35.00 IN STOCK! ORDER THIS HOT GAME NOW! MSRP is $35, pay just $23.95 and don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t be confused by other people_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s strange shipping prices and long drawn out quotes. Shipping of just $9.95 nationwide. Combined shipping is easy and encouraged! Just checkout and we will confirm it with combined shipping as noted in our rules below. Basically 100% shipping on the first game and 50% shipping on the rest, or better. Yes we can combine orders at significant shipping discounts. Please paypal payments to maydaygames@gmail.com. Be SURE you include what item you are buying with the payment. Combined shipping works as follows for domestic (48 lower states) orders: Highest price shipping item: Full shipping cost 2nd-4th highest priced items: 50% off shipping cost for each of these items. 5th-10th highest priced shipping items: 60% off shipping costs for each of these items. 11th+ highest priced shipping items: 75% off shipping for all the rest of the items. As an example say you purchased 15 games, 3 of them with $10 shipping, 5 of them with $8 shipping and 7 of them with $4 shipping. The total shipping for the 15 items would be: Full shipping on the first item: $10.00 50% off shipping on items 2-4: $14.00 (50% off $10, $10 and $8, the next highest shipping cost items) 60% off shipping on items 5-10: $14.40 (60% off of 3 items at $8 shipping and 3 more items at $4 shipping = $36) 75% off shipping on items 11-15: $4.00 (75% off 4 items at $4) Total shipping on these 15 items then would be $10+$14+$14.40 + $4 = $42.40 shipping. This is just an example and your results will vary depending on what you buy of course!

Size: Medium Standard Information listed on all my For Sale Games: ------------------------------------------------------ 1) Shipping cost is the highest cost of all games purchased + the add on cost of each other game. Promo cards or anything else that fits in a bubble mailer will have a base cost of $5 and and an add on cost of $1, a small game has a base cost of $8 and an add on cost of $2, a medium game has a base cost of $14 and an add on cost of $3 and a large game has a base cost of $20 and add on cost of $4. Anything outside that range will be listed specifically. If you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re providing a business address to ship to, take a $1 off the shipping. 2) Purchase a $100 or more worth of games and get 5% off your total order. 3) Purchase $200 or more and get 5% off and free shipping. 4) If you see any games on my for trade list that aren_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t up for sale, feel free to ask me to add to the market. 5) Most conditions are listed as very good, all those items listed as such range from very good to like new. 6) Amazon and game store gift cards are usually accepted but please check with me first if that_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s an option you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;d like to pursue. 7) I try to list editions but if an edition isn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t listed and it matters to you, please ask! If an item is bought and another edition was expected but you didn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t ask, then I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m happy to refund but I can_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t cover either shipping charge.

In shrinkwrap. Perfect. I store my games in a pet-free and smoke-free environment and I package my games for shipment with the utmost care. I ship quickly - within 24 hours of receiving payment. I have many hundreds of games for sale and would be happy to combine shipping charges for multiple games to save you money. Shipping weight is 5 pounds.

Pristine condition, only played once, includes Crossbow promo _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;coaster_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;. Original insert is gone, instead I have a great Plano (plastic) container that holds the cards, tokens, walls, etc. Unfortunately it is expensive: if you want the Plano case, please let me know and add $8 for replacement cost. Otherwise I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll transfer the contents to baggies. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m an avid game collector in a smoke-free home and take good care of my games. Unless otherwise noted above, game is complete with little or no shelf wear or damaged components. High-resolution picture available upon request. Domestic US shipping is $12.35 for USPS with tracking (insurance is optional if you want to pay for it). I pack my game carefully and have had no complaints or issues. I usually ship the next business day after receipt of payment. Must pay me via PayPal (I will cover the fees). International shipping will be ACTUAL SHIPPING COST. Contact me BEFORE ORDERING if you have any questions about shipping.

Players must work together to defend their castle, in the center of the board, from monsters that attack out of the forest, at the edges of the board. Players trade cards, hit and slay monsters, and plan strategies together to keep their castle towers intact. The players either win or lose together, but only the player with the most victory points is declared the Master Slayer. Players must balance the survival of the group with their own desire to win.
